headline: Behind Trump’s Push to Remake the Kennedy Center in His Own Image
summary: WASHINGTON—President  Trump  knows which slabs of white marble cladding to the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts need to be replaced and what type of pipes run through the venue.  Kennedy Center officials are in discussions with the company about taking over ticketing.  Overhauling the Kennedy Center has become a fixation for Trump—and no detail is too small for the real-estate-developer-turned-president.
